name: TabScope - Firefox 4 nav-buttons
description:
TabScope nav-buttons styled like Firefox 4.

All code and graphics by Skorek, creator of Fx4 theme for Firefox. (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/49178)

Resources used:
 • snippet of "browser.css" from Fx4
 • Data URI converted from "tabscope-icons.png" from Fx4

Used with permission.

Integrates well with style 25225!
----

Fixed the ID of the button image(s). Please comment if it stops working.
